Articles.Content:
Hello. I would like to know how do Squad features creations during the fanwork friday for example. Do they pick it up on the forums ? Do you need to submit it ?

Thank you for your answers.

Coming from a guy who made the Daily Kerbal three times (sorry for bragging, I'm just rather proud of the stuff I do):

Submitting a PM (private message) to a guy named Rowsdower definitely helps. There's a chance that the KSP staff will find your stuff on their own, but it's not all that great, especially if you're new and not that well known yet.

Let me know if you need help submitting a PM. Also, what fantastic creation(s) have you made?

-Upsilon

Edited November 26, 2014 by UpsilonAerospace
Hi Elowiny, Rowsdower picks the creations he wants to showcase in the Daily Kerbal. They're usually picked up by moderators or members of Squad, but you can always send him a message directly.

Thanks.

First, where do they pick up the conception ? On ksp fanart thread ?

Secondly, how to PM to Rowsdower ?

And finally, I plan of making an irl model of the ksp system with paint and balls and stuff.

Rowsdower and other members of the KSP staff can pick things up from anywhere, quite literally. Sometimes they come from the oddest places, but mostly they'll be from various places around the forum.

You can PM Rows by clicking the Settings button at the top-right of the page, then selecting Send New Message from the first menu at the left of that page. Simply enter Rowsdower in the 'to' box and write him a message.
